timeline.bodyText: Crazy idea, but instead of removing, should we just reset the depth to 0?
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: @bantonsson what do you think? On the one hand, this is a recipe for a memory leak with non cached threads, on the other it's a parsimonious approach when threads are cached.
replies.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: I actually think that it's fine to leave the Depth in there. I mean if people are creating threads and they don't run to completion, they have other issues.
